member.name: DROPIMAGETYPE
member.summary: Values used with the structure to specify the drop image.

member.name: DROPIMAGETYPE.DROPIMAGE_INVALID
member.summary: No drop image preference; use the default image.

member.name: DROPIMAGETYPE.DROPIMAGE_NONE
member.summary: A red bisected circle such as that found on a "no smoking" sign.

member.name: DROPIMAGETYPE.DROPIMAGE_COPY
member.summary: A plus sign (+) that indicates a copy operation.

member.name: DROPIMAGETYPE.DROPIMAGE_MOVE
member.summary: An arrow that indicates a move operation.

member.name: DROPIMAGETYPE.DROPIMAGE_LINK
member.summary: An arrow that indicates a link.

member.name: DROPIMAGETYPE.DROPIMAGE_LABEL
member.summary: A tag icon that indicates that the metadata will be changed.

member.name: DROPIMAGETYPE.DROPIMAGE_WARNING
member.summary: A yellow exclamation mark that indicates that a problem has been encountered in the operation.

member.name: DROPIMAGETYPE.DROPIMAGE_NOIMAGE
member.summary: Windows 7 and later. Use no drop image.
